name: We need to stop that giant cheese before it destroys our town!
name_original: We need to stop that giant cheese before it destroys our town!
description:
You need to stop that giant cheese before it destroys your town!

NOTE: SOUND IN WEB VERSION IS CRISPY (in a bad way) - DOWNLOAD VERSION HAS BETTER SOUND!

Features:

  • Talking books (and other talking things)
  • 1 silly story (surprise, surprise)
  • 5 endings
  • 5 minutes playtime (10-25 minutes if you play to get all endings)
    Based on the topics "We need to stop that giant cheese before it destroys our town!" and "Book" from a Berlin Mini Jam (but mostly made after the jam)
